title: Lifestyle Sales Representative - NYC - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: You will work closely with the national sales manger to develop accurate and realistic go-to-market plans, quarterly assortments, forecasts, and scenario plans.
